text:
6 months 7 months
 8 months
Week 14
The actual size from head to 
bottom is about 85mm
Week 22
The actual size from head to 
bottom is about 27cm

They are also swallowing small 
amounts	of	the	amniotic	fluid	in	
which	they	are	floating,	and	are	
passing tiny amounts of urine 
back	into	the	fluid.	Sometimes	
your baby may get hiccups, 
and you can feel the jerk of 
each hiccup. Your baby may 
also begin to follow a pattern 
for waking and sleeping. Very 
often	this	is	a	different	pattern	
from y
